text: I'd maybe done about 12 movies when I decided that this was what I was going to do.
author: Jeff Bridges

text: I'm used to watching old movies of myself.
author: Jeff Bridges

text: Normally, I love to go to the movies and when I see a character portrayed by different actors at different ages, it kind of pops a little bit for me. It brings me out of the movie experience. Now we have the technology to cure that.
author: Jeff Bridges
